comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.raw_text: This would solve the "I can't tell from about: which beta I'm on" issue, somewhat.
comments.text: This would solve the "I can't tell from about: which beta I'm on" issue, somewhat.

comments.raw_text:
We could add something here like:
http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/toolkit/content/Makefile.in#60

MOZ_SOURCE_TAGS = $(shell hg -R $(topsrcdir) parent --template="{tags}\n" 2>/dev/null)

and then preprocess it into buildconfig.html.
comments.creator: ted@mielczarek.org
comments.text:
